channel.title: Constructor ClanChatHandler()?
channel.description:
[code]src\server\Server.java:82: cannot find symbol symbol : constructor ClanChatHandler() location: class server.world.ClanChatHandler public static ClanChatHandler clanChat = new ClanChatHandler(); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
i followed this tut.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/354401-pi-dicing-real-way-through-clan-chats.html

item.title: Constructor ClanChatHandler()?
item.dc:creator: @nickypie nickypie
item.description:
@nickypie wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:2, topic:445933”]in your ClanChatHandler class add

[code]public ClanChatHandler() {

}[/code][/quote]

i followed the tut and it said i had to add this. and if i remove it i get 13 errors.

public class ClanChatHandler {

		private Client c;
	public ClanChatHandler(Client Client) {
		this.c = Client;
	}
